meanings.definition: The quality or state of being loyal.
meanings.sent1: Her loyalism to her best friend never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The dog's loyalism to its owner was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The cat's loyalism to the fish was comical.
meanings.sent4: His loyalism to his favorite sports team was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's loyalism to his country was truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The ideology or movement advocating loyalty to a government or ruler.
meanings.sent1: The loyalism of the citizens towards their leader was evident.
meanings.sent2: The loyalism of the group towards the king was unquestionable.
meanings.sent3: The loyalism of the ants to their queen was quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The loyalism of the followers to their cult leader was concerning.
meanings.sent5: The loyalism of the students to their principal was remarkable.
